transformations.name: ValidateMandatoryColumns
transformations.description: ReportingDateCertificationIDValidateMsg is a test and should be considered as part of the conditional split Insert/Update activity

transformations.name: SplitInsertAndUpdate
transformations.description:
1. The condition assume that the records from the current reporting period are deleted first if any (asset id, fund id, current reporting period)
2. Records where reporting period equal current reporting period (disregard certification id) are inserted/reinserted after delete in 1
3. Remaining records are not from current reporting period and the certification ids must not be null. These are updated

typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	MasterUtcTag as string,
	CurrentRunDateTime as string,
	WorkbookName as string,
	TabName as string,
	CurrentQuarterDate as string,
	MasterPipeline as string
}
source(output(
		Contract_ID as string,
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Reporting_Period as string,
		Validation_Flag as string,
		Execution_Date as string,
		Termination_Date as string,
		Contracted_Party_Company_Name as string,
		Estimated_Maximum_Contract_Value_over_the_course_of_the_contract as string,
		Contract_Currency as string,
		Type_of_goods_or_services as string,
		Executed_By_Entity_1 as string,
		Executed_By_Entity_2 as string,
		Executed_By_Entity_3 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> SourceDataTab
source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Reporting_Period as date,
		Execution_Date as date,
		Termination_Date as date,
		Company_Name as string,
		Contract_Value as decimal(19,4),
		Contract_Currency as string,
		Contract_Type as string,
		Executed_By_Entity1 as string,
		Executed_By_Entity2 as string,
		Executed_By_Entity3 as string,
		Insert_Datetime as timestamp,
		Contract_ID as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT DISTINCT [Asset_ID]\n      ,[Fund_ID]\n      ,[Reporting_Period]\n      ,[Execution_Date]\n      ,[Termination_Date]\n      ,[Company_Name]\n      ,[Contract_Value]\n      ,[Contract_Currency]\n      ,[Contract_Type]\n      ,[Executed_By_Entity1]\n      ,[Executed_By_Entity2]\n      ,[Executed_By_Entity3]\n      ,[Insert_Datetime]\n      ,[Contract_ID]\n FROM [relational].[OPS_Contract]',
	format: 'query') ~> RelationalContractLkp
LookupContract derive(AssetReportingDateValidateMsg = iif(isNull(Asset_ID) || isNull(Fund_ID) || isNull(Reporting_Period), "Invalid Asset or Reporting Period/", ""),
		ReportingDateContractIDValidateMsg = iif(iif(CurrentReportingPeriod != Reporting_Period, true(), false()) && isNull(Contract_ID),"Null Contract ID for non-current Reporting Period/",""),
		LkpRelationalContractIDValidateMsg = iif(not(isNull(Contract_ID_Lkp)),
iif(equals(concat(Asset_ID_Lkp,Fund_ID_Lkp), concat(Asset_ID,Fund_ID)),"","Contract ID not belong to Asset/"),""),
		ContractValueValidateMsg = iif(isNull(Estimated_Maximum_Contract_Value_over_the_course_of_the_contract_toDecimal), "Contract Value/", ""),
		ExecutionDateValidateMsg = iif(not(isNull(Execution_Date)),iif(not(isNull(Execution_Date_toDate)),"","Execution Date/"),"Execution Date/"),
		TerminationDateValidateMsg = iif(not(isNull(Termination_Date)),iif(not(isNull(Termination_Date_toDate)),"","Termination Date/"),"Termination Date/"),
		TypeOfGoodsAndServiceValidateMsg = iif(isNull(Type_of_goods_or_services),"Type of Goods and Services/",""),
		ContractCurrencyValidateMsg = iif(isNull(Contract_Currency),"Contract Currency/",""),
		Entity1ValidateMsg = iif(isNull(Executed_By_Entity_1),"Entity 1/","")) ~> ValidateMandatoryColumns
ValidateMandatoryColumns split(length(concatWS('',AssetReportingDateValidateMsg,
LkpRelationalContractIDValidateMsg,
ReportingDateContractIDValidateMsg,
ContractValueValidateMsg,
ExecutionDateValidateMsg,
TerminationDateValidateMsg,
TypeOfGoodsAndServiceValidateMsg,
ContractCurrencyValidateMsg,
Entity1ValidateMsg)) == 0,
	disjoint: false) ~> SegregateValidInvalidRows@(ValidRows, InvalidRows)
SplitInsertAndUpdate@Insert select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Execution_Date = Execution_Date_toDate,
		Termination_Date = Termination_Date_toDate,
		Company_Name = Contracted_Party_Company_Name,
		Contract_Value = Estimated_Maximum_Contract_Value_over_the_course_of_the_contract_toDecimal,
		Contract_Currency,
		Contract_Type = Type_of_goods_or_services,
		Executed_By_Entity1 = Executed_By_Entity_1,
		Executed_By_Entity2 = Executed_By_Entity_2,
		Executed_By_Entity3 = Executed_By_Entity_3,
		Insert_Datetime,
		Update_Datetime,
		Process_Name
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectedColumnsOutputInsert
SegregateValidInvalidRows@InvalidRows derive(ConcatenatedMessage = concat(AssetReportingDateValidateMsg, ReportingDateContractIDValidateMsg, LkpRelationalContractIDValidateMsg, ContractValueValidateMsg,
ExecutionDateValidateMsg,TerminationDateValidateMsg,TypeOfGoodsAndServiceValidateMsg,ContractCurrencyValidateMsg,Entity1ValidateMsg)) ~> ConcatenateInvalidColumnsMessage
ConcatenateInvalidColumnsMessage select(mapColumn(
		Contract_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Execution_Date,
		Termination_Date,
		Company_Name = Contracted_Party_Company_Name,
		Contract_Value = Estimated_Maximum_Contract_Value_over_the_course_of_the_contract,
		Contract_Currency,
		Contract_Type = Type_of_goods_or_services,
		Executed_By_Entity1 = Executed_By_Entity_1,
		Executed_By_Entity2 = Executed_By_Entity_2,
		Executed_By_Entity3 = Executed_By_Entity_3,
		Insert_Datetime,
		Update_Datetime,
		Source_File = Work_Book,
		Source_Sub_File = Work_Sheet,
		Process_Name,
		Error_Desc = ConcatenatedMessage
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectedOutputColumnsError
DateTypeTransform keyGenerate(output(RowNumber as long),
	startAt: 1L,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> GenerateRowNumber
GenerateRowNumber filter(RowNumber > 1 && 
(not(isNull(Execution_Date)) || not(isNull(Termination_Date)) || 
not(isNull(Contracted_Party_Company_Name)) || not(isNull(Estimated_Maximum_Contract_Value_over_the_course_of_the_contract)) || not(isNull(Contract_Currency)) || 
not(isNull(Type_of_goods_or_services)) || not(isNull(Executed_By_Entity_1)) || not(isNull(Executed_By_Entity_2)) || not(isNull(Executed_By_Entity_3))
)) ~> ExcludeFirstRow
SourceDataTab derive(Reporting_Period = toDate(Reporting_Period),
		Execution_Date_toDate = toDate(Execution_Date),
		Termination_Date_toDate = toDate(Termination_Date),
		Estimated_Maximum_Contract_Value_over_the_course_of_the_contract_toDecimal = toDecimal(Estimated_Maximum_Contract_Value_over_the_course_of_the_contract, 19, 4),
		Contract_ID = toInteger(Contract_ID),
		Insert_Datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'),
		Update_Datetime = toTimestamp('9999-12-31 00:00:00'),
		Work_Book = $WorkbookName,
		Work_Sheet = $TabName,
		Process_Name = concatWS('-',$MasterPipeline,$WorkbookName,$TabName),
		CurrentReportingPeriod = toDate($CurrentQuarterDate)) ~> DateTypeTransform
SegregateValidInvalidRows@ValidRows split(equals(Reporting_Period, CurrentReportingPeriod),
	disjoint: false) ~> SplitInsertAndUpdate@(Insert, Update)
UpdateDatetimeValue select(mapColumn(
		Contract_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Execution_Date = Execution_Date_toDate,
		Termination_Date = Termination_Date_toDate,
		Company_Name = Contracted_Party_Company_Name,
		Contract_Value = Estimated_Maximum_Contract_Value_over_the_course_of_the_contract_toDecimal,
		Contract_Currency,
		Contract_Type = Type_of_goods_or_services,
		Executed_By_Entity1 = Executed_By_Entity_1,
		Executed_By_Entity2 = Executed_By_Entity_2,
		Executed_By_Entity3 = Executed_By_Entity_3,
		Insert_Datetime,
		Update_Datetime,
		Process_Name
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectColumnsOutputUpdate
SplitInsertAndUpdate@Update derive(Update_Datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'),
		Insert_Datetime = Insert_Datetime_Lkp) ~> UpdateDatetimeValue
RelationalContractLkp select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID_Lkp = Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID_Lkp = Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period_Lkp = Reporting_Period,
		Execution_Date_Lkp = Execution_Date,
		Termination_Date_Lkp = Termination_Date,
		Company_Name_Lkp = Company_Name,
		Contract_Value_Lkp = Contract_Value,
		Contract_Currency_Lkp = Contract_Currency,
		Contract_Type_Lkp = Contract_Type,
		Executed_By_Entity1_Lkp = Executed_By_Entity1,
		Executed_By_Entity2_Lkp = Executed_By_Entity2,
		Executed_By_Entity3_Lkp = Executed_By_Entity3,
		Insert_Datetime_Lkp = Insert_Datetime,
		Contract_ID_Lkp = Contract_ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectContractLkp
ExcludeFirstRow, SelectContractLkp lookup(Contract_ID == Contract_ID_Lkp,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupContract
SelectedColumnsOutputInsert sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionFileNames:[(concatWS("_", $WorkbookName, $TabName,$CurrentQuarterDate,'LoadReady'))],
	mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Execution_Date,
		Termination_Date,
		Company_Name,
		Contract_Value,
		Contract_Currency,
		Contract_Type,
		Executed_By_Entity1,
		Executed_By_Entity2,
		Executed_By_Entity3,
		Insert_Datetime,
		Update_Datetime,
		Process_Name
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> TargetPersistentParquetInsert
SelectedOutputColumnsError sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Contract_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Execution_Date,
		Termination_Date,
		Company_Name,
		Contract_Value,
		Contract_Currency,
		Contract_Type,
		Executed_By_Entity1,
		Executed_By_Entity2,
		Executed_By_Entity3,
		Insert_Datetime,
		Update_Datetime,
		Source_File,
		Source_Sub_File,
		Process_Name,
		Error_Desc
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> ErrorTable
SelectColumnsOutputUpdate sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionFileNames:[(concatWS("_", $WorkbookName, $TabName,$CurrentQuarterDate,'Update'))],
	mapColumn(
		Contract_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Execution_Date,
		Termination_Date,
		Company_Name,
		Contract_Value,
		Contract_Currency,
		Contract_Type,
		Executed_By_Entity1,
		Executed_By_Entity2,
		Executed_By_Entity3,
		Insert_Datetime,
		Update_Datetime,
		Process_Name
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> TargetPersistenParquetUpdate

transformations.name: ValidateMandatoryColumns
transformations.description: ReportingDateCertificationIDValidateMsg is a test and should be considered as part of the conditional split Insert/Update activity

transformations.name: SplitInsertAndUpdate
transformations.description:
1. The condition assume that the records from the current reporting period are deleted first if any (asset id, fund id, current reporting period)
2. Records where reporting period equal current reporting period (disregard certification id) are inserted/reinserted after delete in 1
3. Remaining records are not from current reporting period and the certification ids must not be null. These are updated

typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	MasterUtcTag as string ("2020-08-28T06:05:53.4181322Z"),
	CurrentRunDateTime as string ("2020-08-01"),
	WorkbookName as string ("Wenita Forestry Products Q4 FY20 V2.xlsx"),
	TabName as string ("Major Severe Incidents"),
	CurrentQuarterDate as string ("2020-06-30"),
	MasterPipeline as string
}
source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Reporting_Period as string,
		Incident_Id as string,
		Validation_Flag as string,
		Incident_Type as string,
		Category as string,
		Incident_Severity as string,
		Incident_Description as string,
		Investigation_Undertaken as string,
		Incident_Findings as string,
		Incident_Date as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> SourceDataTab
source(output(
		Incident_Type_Code as string,
		Incident_Type as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT Incident_Type_Code\n      ,Incident_Type\n  FROM relational.OPS_Incident_Type\n  WHERE Active_YN = \'Y\'',
	format: 'query',
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> RelationalOpsIncidentType
source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Reporting_Period as date,
		Incident_ID as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT Asset_ID\n      ,Fund_ID\n      ,Reporting_Period\n      ,Incident_ID\n  FROM relational.OPS_Incident',
	format: 'query') ~> RelationalIncident
LookupIncidentType derive(Incident_Type_Validate_Msg = iif(isNull(Incident_Type_Code_Lkp), "Incident Type Lookup Error/", ""),
		Incident_Date_Validate_Msg = iif(isNull(Incident_Date), "Blank Incident Date/", ""),
		Incident_Severity_Validate_Msg = iif(isNull(Incident_Severity), "Blank Incident Severity/", ""),
		AssetReportingDateValidateMsg = iif(isNull(Asset_ID) || isNull(Fund_ID) || isNull(Reporting_Period), "Invalid Asset or Reporting Period/", ""),
		ReportingDateIncidentIDValidateMsg = iif(iif(CurrentReportingPeriod != Reporting_Period, true(), false()) && isNull(Incident_Id),"Null Incident ID for non-current Reporting Period/",""),
		LkpRelationalIncidentIDValidateMsg = iif(not(isNull(Incident_ID_Lkp)),iif(equals(concat(Asset_ID_Lkp,Fund_ID_Lkp), concat(Asset_ID,Fund_ID)),"","Incident ID does not belong to Asset/"),"")) ~> ValidateMandatoryColumns
ValidateMandatoryColumns split(length(concatWS('',Incident_Type_Validate_Msg,Incident_Date_Validate_Msg,Incident_Severity_Validate_Msg,AssetReportingDateValidateMsg,LkpRelationalIncidentIDValidateMsg,ReportingDateIncidentIDValidateMsg)) == 0,
	disjoint: false) ~> SegregateValidInvalidRows@(ValidRows, InvalidRows)
SplitInsertAndUpdate@Insert select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Incident_Id,
		Incident_Type_Code = Incident_Type_Code_Lkp,
		Incident_Severity,
		Incident_Description,
		Investigation_Undertaken,
		Incident_Findings,
		Incident_Date,
		Insert_Datetime,
		Update_Datetime,
		Work_Book,
		Work_Sheet,
		Process_Name
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectedColumnsOutputInsert
SegregateValidInvalidRows@InvalidRows derive(ConcatenatedMessage = concat(Incident_Type_Validate_Msg, Incident_Date_Validate_Msg,AssetReportingDateValidateMsg,ReportingDateIncidentIDValidateMsg,LkpRelationalIncidentIDValidateMsg)) ~> ConcatenateInvalidColumnsMessage
ConcatenateInvalidColumnsMessage select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Incident_Id,
		Incident_Type,
		Incident_Severity,
		Incident_Description,
		Investigation_Undertaken,
		Incident_Findings,
		Incident_Date,
		Insert_Datetime,
		Source_File = Work_Book,
		Source_Sub_File = Work_Sheet,
		Process_Name,
		Error_Desc = ConcatenatedMessage
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectedOutputColumnsError
DateTypeTransform keyGenerate(output(RowNumber as long),
	startAt: 1L,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> GenerateRowNumber
GenerateRowNumber filter(RowNumber > 1 &&
(not(isNull(Incident_Id)) || not(isNull(Incident_Type)) || not(isNull(Incident_Severity)) ||
not(isNull(Incident_Description)) || not(isNull(Investigation_Undertaken)) || not(isNull(Incident_Findings)) || not(isNull(Incident_Date))
)) ~> ExcludeFirstRow
SourceDataTab derive(Incident_Id = toInteger(Incident_Id),
		Reporting_Period = toDate(Reporting_Period),
		Incident_Date = toDate(Incident_Date),
		Insert_Datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'),
		Update_Datetime = toTimestamp('9999-12-31 00:00:00'),
		Work_Book = $WorkbookName,
		Work_Sheet = $TabName,
		Process_Name = concatWS('-',$MasterPipeline,$WorkbookName,$TabName),
		CurrentReportingPeriod = toDate($CurrentQuarterDate)) ~> DateTypeTransform
RelationalOpsIncidentType select(mapColumn(
		Incident_Type_Code_Lkp = Incident_Type_Code,
		Incident_Type_Lkp = Incident_Type
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectIncidentTypeLkp
LookupIncidents, SelectIncidentTypeLkp lookup(Incident_Type == Incident_Type_Lkp,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'first',
	asc(Incident_Type_Code_Lkp, false),
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupIncidentType
SegregateValidInvalidRows@ValidRows split(equals(Reporting_Period, CurrentReportingPeriod),
	disjoint: false) ~> SplitInsertAndUpdate@(Insert, Update)
UpdateDatetimeValue select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Incident_Id,
		Incident_Type_Code = Incident_Type_Code_Lkp,
		Incident_Severity,
		Incident_Description,
		Investigation_Undertaken,
		Incident_Findings,
		Incident_Date,
		Insert_Datetime,
		Update_Datetime,
		Work_Book,
		Work_Sheet,
		Process_Name
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectColumnsOutputUpdate
SplitInsertAndUpdate@Update derive(Update_Datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney')) ~> UpdateDatetimeValue
RelationalIncident select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID_Lkp = Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID_Lkp = Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period_Lkp = Reporting_Period,
		Incident_ID_Lkp = Incident_ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectIncidentLkp
ExcludeFirstRow, SelectIncidentLkp lookup(Incident_Id == Incident_ID_Lkp,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupIncidents
SelectedColumnsOutputInsert sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionFileNames:[(concatWS("_", $WorkbookName, $TabName,$CurrentQuarterDate,'LoadReady'))],
	mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Incident_Id,
		Incident_Type_Code,
		Incident_Severity,
		Incident_Description,
		Investigation_Undertaken,
		Incident_Findings,
		Incident_Date,
		Insert_Datetime,
		Update_Datetime,
		Work_Book,
		Work_Sheet,
		Process_Name
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> TargetPersistentParquetInsert
SelectedOutputColumnsError sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Incident_Id,
		Incident_Type,
		Incident_Severity,
		Incident_Description,
		Investigation_Undertaken,
		Incident_Findings,
		Incident_Date,
		Insert_Datetime,
		Source_File,
		Source_Sub_File,
		Process_Name,
		Error_Desc
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> ErrorTable
SelectColumnsOutputUpdate sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionFileNames:[(concatWS("_", $WorkbookName, $TabName,$CurrentQuarterDate,'Update'))],
	mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Incident_Id,
		Incident_Type_Code,
		Incident_Severity,
		Incident_Description,
		Investigation_Undertaken,
		Incident_Findings,
		Incident_Date,
		Insert_Datetime,
		Update_Datetime,
		Work_Book,
		Work_Sheet,
		Process_Name
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> TargetPersistenParquetUpdate

transformations.name: ValidateMandatoryColumns
transformations.description: ReportingDateCertificationIDValidateMsg is a test and should be considered as part of the conditional split Insert/Update activity

typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	MasterUtcTag as string,
	CurrentRunDateTime as string,
	WorkbookName as string,
	TabName as string,
	CurrentQuarterDate as string,
	MasterPipeline as string
}
source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Reporting_Period as string,
		Validation_Flag as string,
		Operation_Type as string,
		Area_Treated as string,
		Cost_of_Treatment as string,
		Average_Unit_Cost as string,
		Budget_Area_Treated as string,
		Budget_Treatment_Cost as string,
		Budget_Unit_Cost as string,
		variation_Area_Treated as string,
		variation_Treatment_Cost as string,
		variation_Unit_Cost as string,
		Date_Last_Age_Class_Established as string,
		Species_Survived as string,
		Survival_rate_of_last_age_class_established as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> SourceDataTab
source(output(
		Operation_Type_Code as string,
		Operation_Type as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT DISTINCT [Operation_Type_Code]\n      ,[Operation_Type]\n  FROM [relational].[OPS_Operation_Type]\nWHERE [Active_YN] = \'Y\'',
	format: 'query',
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> RelationalOperationType
LookupOperationType derive(OperationTypeValidateMsg = iif(isNull(Operation_Type_Code_Lkp), "Operation Type/", ""),
		AreaTreatedValidateMsg = iif(not(isNull(Area_Treated)),iif(not(isNull(Area_Treated_toDecimal)),"","Area Treated/"),"Area Treated/"),
		AssetReportingDateValidateMsg = iif(isNull(Asset_ID) || isNull(Fund_ID) || isNull(Reporting_Period), "Invalid Asset or Reporting Period/", "")) ~> ValidateMandatoryColumns
ValidateMandatoryColumns split(length(concatWS('',OperationTypeValidateMsg, AreaTreatedValidateMsg,AssetReportingDateValidateMsg)) == 0,
	disjoint: false) ~> SegregateValidInvalidRows@(ValidRows, InvalidRows)
SegregateValidInvalidRows@ValidRows select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Operation_Type_Code = Operation_Type_Code_Lkp,
		Area_Treated = Area_Treated_toDecimal,
		Treatment_Cost = Cost_of_Treatment,
		Unit_Cost = Average_Unit_Cost,
		Budget_Area_Treated,
		Budget_Treatment_Cost,
		Budget_Unit_Cost,
		Last_Age_Class_Date = Date_Last_Age_Class_Established,
		Species_Survived,
		Last_Age_Class_Survival_Rate = Survival_rate_of_last_age_class_established,
		Insert_Datetime,
		Update_Datetime,
		Process_Name
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectedColumnsOutputInsert
SegregateValidInvalidRows@InvalidRows derive(ConcatenatedMessage = concat(OperationTypeValidateMsg,AreaTreatedValidateMsg,AssetReportingDateValidateMsg)) ~> ConcatenateInvalidColumnsMessage
ConcatenateInvalidColumnsMessage select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Operation_Type,
		Area_Treated,
		Treatment_Cost = Cost_of_Treatment,
		Unit_Cost = Average_Unit_Cost,
		Budget_Area_Treated,
		Budget_Treatment_Cost,
		Budget_Unit_Cost,
		Last_Age_Class_Date = Date_Last_Age_Class_Established,
		Species_Survived,
		Last_Age_Class_Survival_Rate = Survival_rate_of_last_age_class_established,
		Insert_Datetime,
		Source_File = Work_Book,
		Source_Sub_File = Work_Sheet,
		Process_Name,
		Error_Desc = ConcatenatedMessage
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectedOutputColumnsError
DateTypeTransform keyGenerate(output(RowNumber as long),
	startAt: 1L,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> GenerateRowNumber
GenerateRowNumber filter(RowNumber > 1 && 
(not(isNull(Operation_Type)) || not(isNull(Area_Treated)) || not(isNull(Cost_of_Treatment)) || 
not(isNull(Budget_Area_Treated)) || not(isNull(Budget_Treatment_Cost)) || 
not(isNull(Date_Last_Age_Class_Established)) || not(isNull(Species_Survived)) || not(isNull(Survival_rate_of_last_age_class_established))
)) ~> ExcludeFirstRow
SourceDataTab derive(Insert_Datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'),
		Update_Datetime = toTimestamp('9999-12-31 00:00:00'),
		Work_Book = $WorkbookName,
		Work_Sheet = $TabName,
		Process_Name = concatWS('-',$MasterPipeline,$WorkbookName,$TabName),
		CurrentReportingPeriod = toDate($CurrentQuarterDate),
		Reporting_Period = toDate(Reporting_Period),
		Area_Treated_toDecimal = toDecimal(Area_Treated, 19, 4),
		Cost_of_Treatment = toDecimal(Cost_of_Treatment, 19, 4),
		Average_Unit_Cost = toDecimal(Average_Unit_Cost, 19, 4),
		Date_Last_Age_Class_Established = toDate(Date_Last_Age_Class_Established),
		Survival_rate_of_last_age_class_established = toDecimal(Survival_rate_of_last_age_class_established, 5, 2),
		Budget_Area_Treated = toDecimal(Budget_Area_Treated, 19, 4),
		Budget_Treatment_Cost = toDecimal(Budget_Treatment_Cost, 19, 4),
		Budget_Unit_Cost = toDecimal(Budget_Unit_Cost, 19, 4)) ~> DateTypeTransform
RelationalOperationType select(mapColumn(
		Operation_Type_Code_Lkp = Operation_Type_Code,
		Operation_Type_Lkp = Operation_Type
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectOperationTypeLkp
ExcludeFirstRow, SelectOperationTypeLkp lookup(Operation_Type == Operation_Type_Lkp,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupOperationType
SelectedColumnsOutputInsert sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionFileNames:[(concatWS("_", $WorkbookName, $TabName,$CurrentQuarterDate,'LoadReady'))],
	mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Operation_Type_Code,
		Area_Treated,
		Treatment_Cost,
		Unit_Cost,
		Budget_Area_Treated,
		Budget_Treatment_Cost,
		Budget_Unit_Cost,
		Last_Age_Class_Date,
		Species_Survived,
		Last_Age_Class_Survival_Rate,
		Insert_Datetime,
		Update_Datetime,
		Process_Name
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> TargetPersistentParquetInsert
SelectedOutputColumnsError sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Operation_Type,
		Area_Treated,
		Treatment_Cost,
		Unit_Cost,
		Budget_Area_Treated,
		Budget_Treatment_Cost,
		Budget_Unit_Cost,
		Last_Age_Class_Date,
		Species_Survived,
		Last_Age_Class_Survival_Rate,
		Insert_Datetime,
		Source_File,
		Source_Sub_File,
		Process_Name,
		Error_Desc
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> ErrorTable

transformations.name: ValidateMandatoryColumns
transformations.description: ReportingDateCertificationIDValidateMsg is a test and should be considered as part of the conditional split Insert/Update activity

typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	MasterUtcTag as string,
	CurrentRunDateTime as string,
	WorkbookName as string,
	TabName as string,
	CurrentQuarterDate as string,
	MasterPipeline as string
}
source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Reporting_Period as string,
		Transaction_ID as string,
		Validation_Flag as string,
		Transaction_Date as string,
		Related_Parties_Involved as string,
		Transaction_Description as string,
		Transaction_Size_Value as string,
		How_Managed as string,
		How_does_the_transaction_benefit_both_parties as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> SourceDataTab
ExcludeFirstRow derive(Transaction_Date_Validate_Msg = iif(isNull(Transaction_Date),'Blank Transaction Date/',''),
		Related_Parties_Involved_Validate_Msg = iif(isNull(Related_Parties_Involved),'Blank Related Parties Involved/',''),
		Transaction_Size_Value_Validate_Msg = iif(isNull(Transaction_Size_Value),'Blank Transaction Size Value/',''),
		AssetReportingDateValidateMsg = iif(isNull(Asset_ID) || isNull(Fund_ID) || isNull(Reporting_Period), "Invalid Asset or Reporting Period/", "")) ~> ValidateMandatoryColumns
ValidateMandatoryColumns split(length(concatWS('',Transaction_Date_Validate_Msg,Related_Parties_Involved_Validate_Msg,Transaction_Size_Value_Validate_Msg)) == 0,
	disjoint: false) ~> SegregateValidInvalidRows@(ValidRows, InvalidRows)
SegregateValidInvalidRows@ValidRows select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Validation_Flag,
		Transaction_Date,
		Related_Parties_Involved,
		Transaction_Description,
		Transaction_Size_Value,
		How_Managed,
		How_does_the_transaction_benefit_both_parties,
		Insert_Datetime,
		Update_Datetime,
		Work_Book,
		Work_Sheet,
		Process_Name,
		CurrentReportingPeriod,
		RowNumber,
		AssetReportingDateValidateMsg
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectedColumnsOutputInsert
SegregateValidInvalidRows@InvalidRows derive(ConcatenatedMessage = concat(Transaction_Date_Validate_Msg,Related_Parties_Involved_Validate_Msg,Transaction_Size_Value_Validate_Msg,AssetReportingDateValidateMsg)) ~> ConcatenateInvalidColumnsMessage
ConcatenateInvalidColumnsMessage select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Transaction_Date,
		Related_Parties_Involved,
		Transaction_Description,
		Transaction_Size_Value,
		How_Managed,
		How_does_the_transaction_benefit_both_parties,
		Insert_Datetime,
		Update_Datetime,
		Work_Book,
		Work_Sheet,
		Process_Name,
		CurrentReportingPeriod,
		RowNumber,
		AssetReportingDateValidateMsg,
		Error_Desc = ConcatenatedMessage
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectedOutputColumnsError
DateTypeTransform keyGenerate(output(RowNumber as long),
	startAt: 1L,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> GenerateRowNumber
GenerateRowNumber filter(RowNumber > 1 &&
(not(isNull(Transaction_Date)) || not(isNull(Related_Parties_Involved)) || not(isNull(Transaction_Description)) ||
not(isNull(Transaction_Size_Value)) || not(isNull(How_Managed)) || not(isNull(How_does_the_transaction_benefit_both_parties))
)) ~> ExcludeFirstRow
SourceDataTab derive(Insert_Datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'),
		Update_Datetime = toTimestamp('9999-12-31 00:00:00'),
		Work_Book = $WorkbookName,
		Work_Sheet = $TabName,
		Process_Name = concatWS('-',$MasterPipeline,$WorkbookName,$TabName),
		CurrentReportingPeriod = toDate($CurrentQuarterDate),
		Reporting_Period = toDate(Reporting_Period),
		Transaction_Date = toDate(Transaction_Date),
		Related_Parties_Involved = Related_Parties_Involved,
		Transaction_Description = Transaction_Description,
		Transaction_Size_Value = toDecimal(Transaction_Size_Value, 19, 4),
		How_Managed = How_Managed,
		How_does_the_transaction_benefit_both_parties = How_does_the_transaction_benefit_both_parties) ~> DateTypeTransform
SelectedColumnsOutputInsert sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionFileNames:[(concatWS("_", $WorkbookName, $TabName,$CurrentQuarterDate,'LoadReady'))],
	mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Validation_Flag,
		Transaction_Date,
		Related_Parties_Involved,
		Transaction_Description,
		Transaction_Size_Value,
		How_Managed,
		How_does_the_transaction_benefit_both_parties,
		Insert_Datetime,
		Update_Datetime,
		Work_Book,
		Work_Sheet,
		Process_Name,
		CurrentReportingPeriod,
		RowNumber,
		AssetReportingDateValidateMsg
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> TargetPersistentParquetInsert
SelectedOutputColumnsError sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Transaction_Date,
		Related_Parties_Involved,
		Transaction_Description,
		Transaction_Size = Transaction_Size_Value,
		How_Managed,
		Mutual_Benefit = How_does_the_transaction_benefit_both_parties,
		Insert_Datetime,
		Process_Name,
		Source_File = Work_Book,
		Source_Sub_File = Work_Sheet,
		Error_Desc
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> ErrorTable

transformations.name: ValidateMandatoryColumns
transformations.description: ReportingDateCertificationIDValidateMsg is a test and should be considered as part of the conditional split Insert/Update activity

transformations.name: SplitInsertAndUpdate
transformations.description:
1. The condition assume that the records from the current reporting period are deleted first if any (asset id, fund id, current reporting period)
2. Records where reporting period equal current reporting period (disregard certification id) are inserted/reinserted after delete in 1
3. Remaining records are not from current reporting period and the certification ids must not be null. These are updated

typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	MasterUtcTag as string,
	CurrentRunDateTime as string,
	WorkbookName as string,
	TabName as string,
	CurrentQuarterDate as string,
	MasterPipeline as string
}
source(output(
		Project_ID as string,
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Reporting_Period as string,
		Validation_Flag as string,
		Primary_Management_Activity as string,
		Project_Objectives as string,
		Expected_Value_Impact as string,
		Deliverable as string,
		Deliverable_Project_Weighting as string,
		Deliverable_Expected_Completion_Date as string,
		Deliverable_Planned_Completion_Date as string,
		Current_Progress_Percent_Complete as string,
		Notes as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> SourceDataTab
source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Project_ID as integer,
		Reporting_Period as date,
		Primary_Management_Activity as string,
		Project_Objectives as string,
		Expected_Value_Impact as string,
		Deliverable as string,
		Project_Weighting as short,
		Expected_Completion_Date as date,
		Planned_Completion_Date as date,
		Current_Progress_Perc_Complete as short,
		Insert_Datetime as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT DISTINCT [Asset_ID]\n      ,[Fund_ID]\n      ,[Project_ID]\n      ,[Reporting_Period]\n      ,[Primary_Management_Activity]\n      ,[Project_Objectives]\n      ,[Expected_Value_Impact]\n      ,[Deliverable]\n      ,[Project_Weighting]\n      ,[Expected_Completion_Date]\n      ,[Planned_Completion_Date]\n      ,[Current_Progress_Perc_Complete]\n      ,[Insert_Datetime]\n  FROM [relational].[OPS_Strategic_Project]',
	format: 'query') ~> RelationalStrategicProjectsLkp
LookupStrategicProject derive(AssetReportingDateValidateMsg = iif(isNull(Asset_ID) || isNull(Fund_ID) || isNull(Reporting_Period), "Invalid Asset or Reporting Period/", ""),
		ReportingDateProjectIDValidateMsg = iif(iif(CurrentReportingPeriod != Reporting_Period, true(), false()) && isNull(Project_ID),"Null Project ID for non-current Reporting Period/",""),
		LkpRelationalProjectIDValidateMsg = iif(not(isNull(Project_ID_Lkp)),
iif(equals(concat(Asset_ID_Lkp,Fund_ID_Lkp), concat(Asset_ID,Fund_ID)),"","Project ID not belong to Asset/"),""),
		PrimaryManageActivityValidateMsg = iif(isNull(Primary_Management_Activity), "Primary Management Activity/",""),
		ExpectedCompletionValidateMsg = iif(not(isNull(Deliverable_Expected_Completion_Date)),iif(not(isNull(Deliverable_Expected_Completion_Date_toDate)),"","Expected Completion Date/"),"Expected Completion Date/"),
		PlannedCompletionValidateMsg = iif(not(isNull(Deliverable_Planned_Completion_Date)),iif(not(isNull(Deliverable_Planned_Completion_Date_toDate)),"","Planned Completion Date/"),"Planned Completion Date/")) ~> ValidateMandatoryColumns
ValidateMandatoryColumns split(length(concatWS('',AssetReportingDateValidateMsg,
LkpRelationalProjectIDValidateMsg,
ReportingDateProjectIDValidateMsg,
PrimaryManageActivityValidateMsg, ExpectedCompletionValidateMsg, PlannedCompletionValidateMsg)) == 0,
	disjoint: false) ~> SegregateValidInvalidRows@(ValidRows, InvalidRows)
SplitInsertAndUpdate@Insert select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Primary_Management_Activity,
		Project_Objectives,
		Expected_Value_Impact,
		Deliverable,
		Project_Weighting,
		Expected_Completion_Date = Deliverable_Expected_Completion_Date_toDate,
		Planned_Completion_Date = Deliverable_Planned_Completion_Date_toDate,
		Current_Progress_Perc_Complete,
		Insert_Datetime,
		Update_Datetime,
		Process_Name
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectedColumnsOutputInsert
SegregateValidInvalidRows@InvalidRows derive(ConcatenatedMessage = concat(AssetReportingDateValidateMsg, ReportingDateProjectIDValidateMsg, LkpRelationalProjectIDValidateMsg, 
PrimaryManageActivityValidateMsg, ExpectedCompletionValidateMsg, PlannedCompletionValidateMsg)) ~> ConcatenateInvalidColumnsMessage
ConcatenateInvalidColumnsMessage select(mapColumn(
		Project_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Primary_Management_Activity,
		Project_Objectives,
		Expected_Value_Impact,
		Deliverable,
		Project_Weighting,
		Expected_Completion_Date = Deliverable_Expected_Completion_Date,
		Planned_Completion_Date = Deliverable_Planned_Completion_Date,
		Current_Progress_Perc_Complete,
		Insert_Datetime,
		Update_Datetime,
		Source_File = Work_Book,
		Source_Sub_File = Work_Sheet,
		Process_Name,
		Error_Desc = ConcatenatedMessage
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectedOutputColumnsError
DateTypeTransform keyGenerate(output(RowNumber as long),
	startAt: 1L,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> GenerateRowNumber
SourceDataTab derive(Reporting_Period = toDate(Reporting_Period),
		Deliverable_Expected_Completion_Date_toDate = toDate(Deliverable_Expected_Completion_Date),
		Deliverable_Planned_Completion_Date_toDate = toDate(Deliverable_Planned_Completion_Date),
		Project_Weighting = toShort(Deliverable_Project_Weighting),
		Current_Progress_Perc_Complete = toShort(toDecimal(Current_Progress_Percent_Complete, 3, 2) * 100),
		Project_ID = toInteger(Project_ID),
		Insert_Datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'),
		Update_Datetime = toTimestamp('9999-12-31 00:00:00'),
		Work_Book = $WorkbookName,
		Work_Sheet = $TabName,
		Process_Name = concatWS('-',$MasterPipeline,$WorkbookName,$TabName),
		CurrentReportingPeriod = toDate($CurrentQuarterDate)) ~> DateTypeTransform
SegregateValidInvalidRows@ValidRows split(equals(Reporting_Period, CurrentReportingPeriod),
	disjoint: false) ~> SplitInsertAndUpdate@(Insert, Update)
UpdateDatetimeValue select(mapColumn(
		Project_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Primary_Management_Activity,
		Project_Objectives,
		Expected_Value_Impact,
		Deliverable,
		Project_Weighting,
		Expected_Completion_Date = Deliverable_Expected_Completion_Date_toDate,
		Planned_Completion_Date = Deliverable_Planned_Completion_Date_toDate,
		Current_Progress_Perc_Complete,
		Insert_Datetime,
		Update_Datetime,
		Process_Name
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectColumnsOutputUpdate
SplitInsertAndUpdate@Update derive(Update_Datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'),
		Insert_Datetime = Insert_Datetime_Lkp) ~> UpdateDatetimeValue
RelationalStrategicProjectsLkp select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID_Lkp = Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID_Lkp = Fund_ID,
		Project_ID_Lkp = Project_ID,
		Reporting_Period_Lkp = Reporting_Period,
		Primary_Management_Activity_Lkp = Primary_Management_Activity,
		Project_Objectives_Lkp = Project_Objectives,
		Expected_Value_Impact_Lkp = Expected_Value_Impact,
		Deliverable_Lkp = Deliverable,
		Project_Weighting_Lkp = Project_Weighting,
		Expected_Completion_Date_Lkp = Expected_Completion_Date,
		Planned_Completion_Date_Lkp = Planned_Completion_Date,
		Current_Progress_Perc_Complete_Lkp = Current_Progress_Perc_Complete,
		Insert_Datetime_Lkp = Insert_Datetime
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectStrategicProjectsLkp
ExcludeFirstRow, SelectStrategicProjectsLkp lookup(Project_ID == Project_ID_Lkp,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupStrategicProject
GenerateRowNumber filter(RowNumber > 1 && 
(not(isNull(Primary_Management_Activity)) || not(isNull(Project_Objectives)) || 
not(isNull(Expected_Value_Impact)) || not(isNull(Deliverable)) || not(isNull(Deliverable_Project_Weighting)) || 
not(isNull(Deliverable_Expected_Completion_Date)) || not(isNull(Deliverable_Planned_Completion_Date)) || not(isNull(Current_Progress_Percent_Complete))
)) ~> ExcludeFirstRow
SelectedColumnsOutputInsert sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionFileNames:[(concatWS("_", $WorkbookName, $TabName,$CurrentQuarterDate,'LoadReady'))],
	mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Primary_Management_Activity,
		Project_Objectives,
		Expected_Value_Impact,
		Deliverable,
		Project_Weighting,
		Expected_Completion_Date,
		Planned_Completion_Date,
		Current_Progress_Perc_Complete,
		Insert_Datetime,
		Update_Datetime,
		Process_Name
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> TargetPersistentParquetInsert
SelectedOutputColumnsError sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Project_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Primary_Management_Activity,
		Project_Objectives,
		Expected_Value_Impact,
		Deliverable,
		Project_Weighting,
		Expected_Completion_Date,
		Planned_Completion_Date,
		Current_Progress_Perc_Complete,
		Insert_Datetime,
		Update_Datetime,
		Source_File,
		Source_Sub_File,
		Process_Name,
		Error_Desc
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> ErrorTable
SelectColumnsOutputUpdate sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionFileNames:[(concatWS("_", $WorkbookName, $TabName,$CurrentQuarterDate,'Update'))],
	mapColumn(
		Project_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Primary_Management_Activity,
		Project_Objectives,
		Expected_Value_Impact,
		Deliverable,
		Project_Weighting,
		Expected_Completion_Date,
		Planned_Completion_Date,
		Current_Progress_Perc_Complete,
		Insert_Datetime,
		Update_Datetime,
		Process_Name
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> TargetPersistenParquetUpdate

transformations.name: ValidateMandatoryColumns
transformations.description: ReportingDateCertificationIDValidateMsg is a test and should be considered as part of the conditional split Insert/Update activity

typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	MasterUtcTag as string,
	CurrentRunDateTime as string,
	WorkbookName as string,
	TabName as string,
	CurrentQuarterDate as string,
	MasterPipeline as string
}
source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Reporting_Period as string,
		Validation_Flag as string,
		Customer as string,
		Domestic_or_Export as string,
		Species as string,
		Product_Type as string,
		Delivery_Point as string,
		Price_Point as string,
		Sales_Unit as string,
		Sales_Quantity as string,
		Average_Sales_Price as string,
		Sales_Revenue as string,
		Production_Cost as string,
		Stumpage as string,
		Unit_Stumpage as string,
		Currency as string,
		Month as string,
		Budget_Sales_Quantity as string,
		Budget_Sales_Revenue as string,
		Budget_Production_Cost as string,
		Budget_Unit_Stumpage as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> SourceDataTab
source(output(
		Species_Code as string,
		Species as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT [Species_Code]\n      ,[Species]\n  FROM [relational].[OPS_Species_Type]\n  WHERE [Active_YN] = \'Y\'',
	format: 'query',
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> RelationalSpeciesType
source(output(
		Sales_Unit_Code as string,
		Sales_Unit as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT Sales_Unit_Code\n      ,Sales_Unit\n  FROM relational.OPS_Sales_Unit\n  WHERE Active_YN = \'Y\'',
	format: 'query') ~> RelationalSalesUnit
source(output(
		Price_Point_Code as string,
		Price_Point as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT Price_Point_Code\n      ,Price_Point\n  FROM relational.OPS_Price_Point\n  WHERE Active_YN = \'Y\'',
	format: 'query') ~> RelationalDeliveryPoint
LookupPricePointFromDeliveryPoint derive(SpeciesTypeValidateMsg = iif(isNull(Species_Code_Lkp), "Species/", ""),
		SalesUnitValidateMsg = iif(isNull(Sales_Unit_Code_Lkp), "Sales Unit/", ""),
		AssetReportingDateValidateMsg = iif(isNull(Asset_ID) || isNull(Fund_ID) || isNull(Reporting_Period), "Invalid Asset or Reporting Period/", ""),
		DeliveryPointValidateMsg = iif(isNull(Price_Point_Code_Lkp), "Delivery Point/", ""),
		CustomerValidateMsg = iif(isNull(Customer),"Customer/",""),
		DomesticExportValidateMsg = iif(isNull(Domestic_or_Export),"Domestic or Export/",""),
		PricePointValidateMsg = iif(isNull(Delivery_Point),"Price Point/",""),
		SalesQtyValidateMsg = iif(isNull(Sales_Quantity),"Sales Quantity/",""),
		ProductTypeValidateMsg = iif(isNull(Product_Type),"Product Type/","")) ~> ValidateMandatoryColumns
ValidateMandatoryColumns split(length(concatWS('',SpeciesTypeValidateMsg,
SalesUnitValidateMsg,
AssetReportingDateValidateMsg,
DeliveryPointValidateMsg,
CustomerValidateMsg,
DomesticExportValidateMsg,
PricePointValidateMsg,
SalesQtyValidateMsg,
ProductTypeValidateMsg)) == 0,
	disjoint: false) ~> SegregateValidInvalidRows@(ValidRows, InvalidRows)
SegregateValidInvalidRows@ValidRows select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Customer,
		Domestic_Export = Domestic_or_Export,
		Product = Product_Type,
		Delivery_Point_Code = Delivery_Point,
		Price_Point,
		Sales_Quantity,
		Average_Sales_Price,
		Sales_Revenue,
		Production_Cost,
		Stumpage,
		Unit_Stumpage,
		Currency_Code = Currency,
		Sales_Month = Month,
		Budget_Sales_Quantity,
		Budget_Sales_Revenue,
		Budget_Production_Cost,
		Budget_Stumpage = Budget_Unit_Stumpage,
		Insert_Datetime,
		Update_Datetime,
		Process_Name,
		Sales_Unit_Code = Sales_Unit_Code_Lkp,
		Species_Code = Species_Code_Lkp
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectedColumnsOutputInsert
SegregateValidInvalidRows@InvalidRows derive(ConcatenatedMessage = concat(SpeciesTypeValidateMsg,
SalesUnitValidateMsg,
AssetReportingDateValidateMsg,
DeliveryPointValidateMsg,
CustomerValidateMsg,
DomesticExportValidateMsg,
PricePointValidateMsg,
SalesQtyValidateMsg,
ProductTypeValidateMsg)) ~> ConcatenateInvalidColumnsMessage
ConcatenateInvalidColumnsMessage select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Validation_Flag,
		Customer,
		Domestic_Export = Domestic_or_Export,
		Species,
		Product = Product_Type,
		Delivery_Point_Code = Delivery_Point,
		Price_Point,
		Sales_Unit,
		Sales_Quantity,
		Average_Sales_Price,
		Sales_Revenue,
		Production_Cost,
		Stumpage,
		Unit_Stumpage,
		Currency_Code = Currency,
		Sales_Month = Month,
		Budget_Sales_Quantity,
		Budget_Sales_Revenue,
		Budget_Production_Cost,
		Budget_Stumpage = Budget_Unit_Stumpage,
		Insert_Datetime,
		Source_File = Work_Book,
		Source_Sub_File = Work_Sheet,
		Process_Name,
		Error_Desc = ConcatenatedMessage
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectedOutputColumnsError
DateTypeTransform keyGenerate(output(RowNumber as long),
	startAt: 1L,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> GenerateRowNumber
GenerateRowNumber filter(RowNumber > 1 && 
(not(isNull(Customer)) || not(isNull(Domestic_or_Export)) || not(isNull(Species)) || 
not(isNull(Product_Type)) || not(isNull(Delivery_Point)) || not(isNull(Price_Point)) || 
not(isNull(Sales_Unit)) || not(isNull(Sales_Quantity)) || not(isNull(Average_Sales_Price)) || 
not(isNull(Production_Cost)) || not(isNull(Currency)) || 
not(isNull(Month)) || not(isNull(Budget_Sales_Quantity)) || not(isNull(Budget_Sales_Revenue)) || not(isNull(Budget_Production_Cost)) || 
not(isNull(Budget_Unit_Stumpage))
)) ~> ExcludeFirstRow
SourceDataTab derive(Insert_Datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'),
		Update_Datetime = toTimestamp('9999-12-31 00:00:00'),
		Work_Book = $WorkbookName,
		Work_Sheet = $TabName,
		Process_Name = concatWS('-',$MasterPipeline,$WorkbookName,$TabName),
		CurrentReportingPeriod = toDate($CurrentQuarterDate),
		Reporting_Period = toDate(Reporting_Period),
		Sales_Quantity = toDecimal(Sales_Quantity, 19, 4),
		Sales_Revenue = toDecimal(Sales_Revenue, 19, 4),
		Production_Cost = toDecimal(Production_Cost, 19, 4),
		Stumpage = toDecimal(Stumpage, 19, 4),
		Unit_Stumpage = toDecimal(Unit_Stumpage, 19, 4),
		Average_Sales_Price = toDecimal(Average_Sales_Price, 19, 4),
		Budget_Sales_Quantity = toDecimal(Budget_Sales_Quantity, 19, 4),
		Budget_Sales_Revenue = toDecimal(Budget_Sales_Revenue, 19, 4),
		Budget_Production_Cost = toDecimal(Budget_Production_Cost, 19, 4),
		Budget_Unit_Stumpage = toDecimal(Budget_Unit_Stumpage, 19, 4),
		Price_Point = toDecimal(Price_Point, 19, 4),
		Month = toDate(Month)) ~> DateTypeTransform
RelationalSpeciesType select(mapColumn(
		Species_Code_Lkp = Species_Code,
		Species_Lkp = Species
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectSpeciesTypeLkp
LookupSalesUnit, SelectSpeciesTypeLkp lookup(Species == Species_Lkp,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupSpeciesType
RelationalSalesUnit select(mapColumn(
		Sales_Unit_Code_Lkp = Sales_Unit_Code,
		Sales_Unit_Lkp = Sales_Unit
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectSalesUnitLkp
ExcludeFirstRow, SelectSalesUnitLkp lookup(Sales_Unit == Sales_Unit_Lkp,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupSalesUnit
RelationalDeliveryPoint select(mapColumn(
		Price_Point_Code_Lkp = Price_Point_Code,
		Price_Point_Lkp = Price_Point
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectPricePointLkp
LookupSpeciesType, SelectPricePointLkp lookup(Delivery_Point == Price_Point_Code_Lkp,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupPricePointFromDeliveryPoint
SelectedColumnsOutputInsert sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionFileNames:[(concatWS("_", $WorkbookName, $TabName,$CurrentQuarterDate,'LoadReady'))],
	mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Customer,
		Domestic_Export,
		Product,
		Delivery_Point_Code,
		Price_Point,
		Sales_Quantity,
		Average_Sales_Price,
		Sales_Revenue,
		Production_Cost,
		Stumpage,
		Unit_Stumpage,
		Currency_Code,
		Sales_Month,
		Budget_Sales_Quantity,
		Budget_Sales_Revenue,
		Budget_Production_Cost,
		Budget_Stumpage,
		Insert_Datetime,
		Update_Datetime,
		Process_Name,
		Sales_Unit_Code,
		Species_Code
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> TargetPersistentParquetInsert
SelectedOutputColumnsError sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Species,
		Customer,
		Domestic_Export,
		Sales_Unit,
		Sales_Quantity,
		Sales_Revenue,
		Production_Cost,
		Stumpage,
		Unit_Stumpage,
		Currency_Code,
		Average_Sales_Price,
		Budget_Sales_Quantity,
		Budget_Sales_Revenue,
		Budget_Production_Cost,
		Budget_Stumpage,
		Insert_Datetime,
		Process_Name,
		Product,
		Delivery_Point_Code,
		Price_Point,
		Sales_Month,
		Source_File,
		Source_Sub_File,
		Error_Desc
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> ErrorTable
